data.name: AboutPage_TranslationCredit
data.comment: Please replace this text with something like "Translated into <language> by <your name>."

data.name: AlwaysOnUSBControl_Message
data.value: Charge USB devices, when the laptop is off, sleeping or hibernated.

data.name: AlwaysOnUsbAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Charge USB devices, when the laptop is off, sleeping or hibernated.

data.name: AutomationPage_ActionsEnable_Message
data.value: Lenovo Legion Toolkit mora biti pokrenut da bi automatske akcije radile.

data.name: AutomationPage_Actions_Empty
data.value: Nema definisanih akcija. Kliknite na "Dodaj novu" da bi kreirali novu akciju.

data.name: AutomationPage_Actions_Message
data.value: If enabled, these action will run automatically. Whenever state changes, all actions will be evaluated from top to bottom. Only actions that match current state will run.

data.name: AutomationPage_QuickActions_Empty
data.value: Nema definisanih brzih akcija. Kliknite na "Dodaj novu" da bi kreirali novu brzu akciju.

data.name: AutomationPage_QuickActions_Message
data.value: Brze akcije su dostupne u meniju desnog klika ikone u traci.

data.name: AutomationPipelineControl_Exclusive_ToolTip
data.value: Nemoj izvršavati dalje radnje kada se ova akcija pokrene.

data.name: BalanceModeSettingsWindow_AIEngine_Message
data.value: Automatically detects when certain games are running and tweaks CPU and GPU performance. Temperatures and fan noise might increase.

data.name: BatteryPage_DischargeRate_Message
data.value: Brzina kojom se baterija puni (+) ili prazni (-).

data.name: BatteryPage_MinDischargeRate_Message
data.value: Minimum rate at which battery is charged (+), or discharged (-).

data.name: BatteryPage_MaxDischargeRate_Message
data.value: Maximum rate at which battery is charged (+), or discharged (-).

data.name: BatteryPage_FirstUse_Message
data.value: Kada je baterija prvi put korištena.

data.name: BatteryPage_FullChargeCapacity_Message
data.value: Kapacitet baterije kada je potpuno napunjena.

data.name: BatteryPage_OnBatterySince_Message
data.value: Vrijeme od posljednjeg povezivanja laptopa na punjač. Ovo vrijeme možda neće biti tačno ako je laptop bio napunjen dok je spavao ili isključen.

data.name: ComboBoxHybridModeControl_Message
data.value: Select GPU operating mode based on your computer's usage and power conditions. Switching modes may require restart.

data.name: ComboBoxHybridModeControl_RestartRequired_Message
data.value: Promjena na {0} zahtijeva ponovno pokretanje. Da li želite restartovati sada?

data.name: DeactivateGPUAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Disable discrete GPU if it is active unnecessarily.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly, if internal display is off or Hybrid mode is not active.

data.name: DelayAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Add delay before running next step.

data.name: DiscreteGPUControl_Message
data.value: Disable discrete GPU, if it is active unnecessarily.

data.name: DiscreteGPUControl_MonitorConnected
data.value: Monitor je spojen na nVidia grafičku.

data.name: DisplayBrightnessAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Change display brightness of the built-in display.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly, if internal display is off.

data.name: DonatePage_Message
data.value:
Development and maintenance of Lenovo Legion Toolkit takes a lot of time. If you like using this software you can support its future by donating an amount of your choice.
Click the PayPal logo below or scan the QR code to donate with PayPal.
Thanks in advance!

data.name: ExcludeRefreshRatesWindow_Description
data.value: Uncheck refresh rates that you do not want to use when Fn+R shortcut is used.

data.name: ExcludeRefreshRatesWindow_NoRefreshRatesFound_Message
data.value: Make sure that laptop display is on. Lenovo Legion Toolkit can't load refresh rates for a display that is not on.

data.name: ExtendedHybridModeInfoWindow_Auto_Message
data.value: Use only integrated GPU when on battery and both integrated and discrete GPU when AC adapter is connected. When a non-standard adapter is connected, system switches to Hybrid-iGPU Only Mode.

data.name: ExtendedHybridModeInfoWindow_DGPU_Disclaimer
data.value: Switching to and from this mode requires restart.

data.name: ExtendedHybridModeInfoWindow_DGPU_Message
data.value: Use only discrete GPU. This mode provides best graphics performance, but increases power consumption.

data.name: ExtendedHybridModeInfoWindow_Hybrid_Message
data.value: Both integrated and discrete GPU are enabled. System will automatically switch between them based on its needs.

data.name: ExtendedHybridModeInfoWindow_IGPU_Disclaimer
data.value: This mode only takes effect when discrete GPU is not working.

data.name: ExtendedHybridModeInfoWindow_IGPU_Message
data.value: Only use integrated GPU. This mode minimizes power consumption and noise.

data.name: FlipToStartAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Turn on the laptop when you open the lid.

data.name: FlipToStartControl_Message
data.value: Turn on the laptop when you open the lid.

data.name: FnLockAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Use secondary functions of F1-F12 keys without holding Fn key.

data.name: FnLockControl_Message
data.value: Use secondary functions of F1-F12 keys without holding Fn key.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_Advanced_MinOffset_Message
data.value: WARNING! Some laptops may accept lower values than they indicate, but be careful. This option may result in unpredictable behavior. If you are not sure what are you doing, leave this at 0.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_Advanced_MaxOffset_Message
data.value: WARNING! Some laptops may accept higher values than they indicate, but be careful. This option may result in unpredictable behavior. If you are not sure what are you doing, leave this at 0.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_Advanced_Message
data.value: Do not change options below unless you really know what you are doing.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_Fans_Curve_Message
data.value: Fan speed is not strictly determined by one temperature sensor. It will raise or lower speed per the highest sensor between CPU, GPU and Heatsink temperature. Exact values will appear when you hover mouse over each step.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_Fans_Max_Message
data.value: WARNING! Prolonged usage of this option will degrade fans decreasing their longevity. Seriously, be careful with this option!

data.name: HDRAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Enable high dynamic range (HDR) on the built-in display.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly if the internal display is off.

data.name: HDRControl_Message
data.value: Enable high dynamic range (HDR) on the built-in display.

data.name: HDRControl_Warning
data.value: HDR usage is blocked by Windows settings.

data.name: IncompatibleDevice_Message
data.value: Ovaj uređaj nije kompatibilan sa Lenovo Legion Toolkit.

data.name: Keyboard_VantageEnabledWarning_Message
data.value: Keyboard backlight cannot be controlled in here when Lenovo Vantage or its services are running.

data.name: Keyboard_VantageEnabledWarning_Title
data.value: Lenovo Vantage or its services are running

data.name: NotificationsSettingsWindow_DontShowNotifications_Message
data.value: Disables notification for Fn keys actions like microphone mute. Enable this option if you have conflicts with full screen applications.

data.name: OverDriveAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Improve response time of the built-in display.

data.name: OverDriveControl_Message
data.value: Improve response time of the built-in display.

data.name: PackageControl_Http404Error_Title
data.value: Čini se da je fajl nestao

data.name: PackageControl_HttpGeneralError_Message
data.value: Provjerite da li je vaša internetska veza uspostavljena i radi.

data.name: PackageControl_OldPackageWarning
data.value: Ovaj paket je star više od godinu.

data.name: PackagesPage_Disclaimer_Message
data.value: Ispod je lista softverskih paketa koji su označeni kao kompatibilni sa vašim laptopom. Uvijek provjerite da li instalirate ispravne pakete.

data.name: PackagesPage_DownloadFailed_Message
data.value: Provjerite da li su tip uređaja i OS ispravno postavljeni.

data.name: PackagesPage_DownloadInProgress_Message
data.value: Promjena sortiranja, filtriranje rezultata, skrivanje paketa ili osvježavanje liste će zaustaviti preuzimanje. Želite li nastaviti?

data.name: PowerModeControl_Message
data.value: Change performance mode. Performance mode can also be changed with Fn+Q.

data.name: PowerModeControl_Warning
data.value: Selected power mode may not work correctly without AC adapter connected.

data.name: RefreshRateAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Change refresh rate of the built-in display.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly, if internal display is off.

data.name: RefreshRateControl_Message
data.value: Change refresh rate of the built-in display.

data.name: RunAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Run a script or a program. Make sure that your script runs correctly first.

data.name: SelectSmartKeyPipelinesWindow_List_Description
data.value: Choose one or more quick actions to cycle through

data.name: SettingsPage_Autorun_Message
data.value: Start minimized to tray when you log in to Windows. Startup is delayed by 30 seconds for compatibility reasons.

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableLegionZone_Error_Message
data.value: Legion Zone možda nije ispravno onemogućeno

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableLegionZone_Message
data.value: Disable Legion Zone and its service without uninstalling it. Restart is recommended after changing this option.

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableLegionSpace_Message
data.value: Disable Legion Space and its service without uninstalling it. Restart is recommended after changing this option.

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableLenovoHotkeys_Error_Message
data.value: Lenovo Hotkeys možda nisu ispravno onemogućeni

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableLenovoHotkeys_Message
data.value: Disable Lenovo Hotkeys and its service without uninstalling it. If disabled, this app will handle Fn shortcuts. Restart is recommended after changing this option.

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableVantage_Error_Message
data.value: Lenovo Vantage and/or ImController may have not been disabled correctly

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableVantage_Error_Title
data.value: Couldn't disable Lenovo Vantage and/or ImController

data.name: SettingsPage_DisableVantage_Message
data.value: Disable Lenovo Vantage and ImController without uninstalling them. Restart is recommended after changing this option.

data.name: SettingsPage_EnableLegionZone_Error_Message
data.value: Legion Zone možda nije ispravno omogućeno

data.name: SettingsPage_EnableLenovoHotkeys_Error_Message
data.value: Lenovo Hotkeys možda nisu ispravno omogućeni

data.name: SettingsPage_EnableVantage_Error_Message
data.value: Lenovo Vantage and/or ImController may have not been enabled correctly

data.name: SettingsPage_EnableVantage_Error_Title
data.value: Couldn't enable Lenovo Vantage and/or ImController

data.name: SettingsPage_ExcludeRefreshRates_Message
data.value: You can exclude refresh rates, to make Fn+R shortcut more useful.

data.name: SettingsPage_MinimizeOnClose_Message
data.value: Always minimize to tray. Close with right click on tray icon.

data.name: SettingsPage_SmartKeyDoublePressAction_Message
data.value: Assign Quick Action to Fn+F9 double press.

data.name: SettingsPage_SmartKeySinglePressAction_Message
data.value: Assign Quick Action to Fn+F9 single press.

data.name: SettingsPage_Theme_Description
data.value: Postavite svijetlu temu, tamnu tamu ili pratite sistemske postavke.

data.name: SpectrumKeyboardBacklightEditEffectWindow_Effect_Warning
data.value: This effect will be applied to the whole keyboard and will replace all other effects.

data.name: ToggleHybridModeControl_Message
data.value: Omogućava promjenu između integrisane i diskretne grafičke. Zahtijeva ponovno pokretanje.

data.name: ToggleHybridModeControl_RestartRequired_Message
data.value: Promjena Hibridnog režima zahtijeva ponovno pokretanje. Da li želite restartovati sada?

data.name: UnsupportedWindow_Disclaimer
data.value:
Možete izabrati da nastavite na svoju odgovornost, ali imajte na umu da neke od funkcija neće biti dostupne i/ili neće ispravno raditi.
Logiranje će biti automatski omogućeno, ukoliko izaberete da nastavite.

data.name: UnsupportedWindow_Disclaimer_GitHub
data.value: Provjerite stranicu našeg projekta na GitHub-u za više informacija.

data.name: UnsupportedWindow_Message
data.value: Lenovo Legion Toolkit nije bio testiran sa vašim uređajem.

data.name: WhiteKeyboardBacklightControl_Message
data.value: Možete promijeniti svjetlost sa Fn + Space

data.name: WinKeyAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Disable Windows key on built-in keyboard.

data.name: MicrophoneControl_Message
data.value: When off, microphones will be muted.

data.name: MicrophoneAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: When off, microphones will be muted.

data.name: ResolutionControl_Message
data.value: Change resolution of the built-in display.

data.name: ResolutionAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Change resolution of the built-in display.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly, if internal display is off.

data.name: DpiScaleControl_Message
data.value: Change scale of the built-in display.

data.name: DpiScaleAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Change scaling of the built-in display.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly, if internal display is off.

data.name: OneLevelWhiteKeyboardBacklightControl_Message
data.value: You can turn backlight on or off with Fn+Space.

data.name: EditDashboardWindow_Disclaimer_Message
data.value: Some features may not appear on the Dashboard depending on state and configuration of your laptop.

data.name: TurnOffMonitorsControl_Message
data.value: Turn off all available displays. Moving the mouse or pressing the keyboard will wake displays up.

data.name: GodModePresetAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Activate Custom Mode preset. This settings takes effect only when Custom Mode is enabled.

data.name: SettingsPage_SynchronizeBrightnessToAllPowerPlans_Message
data.value: When on, same brightness level will be applied to all Windows power plans whenever you change it.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_LongTermPL_Description
data.value: The continuous power consumption that can be reached by the CPU.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_ShortTermPL_Description
data.value: The peak power consumption that can be reached by the CPU within a short amount time.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_PeakPL_Description
data.value: The maximum instantaneous power consumption that can be reached by the CPU.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_CrossLoading_Description
data.value: The maximum power consumption that can be reached by the CPU when both CPU and GPU are fully utilized.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_APUsPPT_PL_Description
data.value: The peak power consumption that can be reached by the CPU with a minor delay.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_TempLimit_Description
data.value: The maximum temperature that can be reached by the CPU before frequency and power is reduced.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_GPU_DynamicBoost_Description
data.value: The additional maximum power that can be allocated to the GPU based on the power consumption of the CPU.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_GPU_CTGP_Description
data.value: The additional amount of power that can be allocated to the GPU on top of base power consumption.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_GPU_TempLimit_Description
data.value: The maximum temperature that can be reached by the GPU before frequency and power is reduced.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_CPU_PL1Tau_Description
data.value: The amount of time the CPU is allowed to boost and use Short Term Power Limit for. When Tau expires, Long Term Power Limit is used.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_GPU_TotalProcessingPowerTargetOnAcOffsetFromBaselineControl
data.value: Total Processor Power Target In AC

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_GPU_TotalProcessingPowerTargetOnAcOffsetFromBaselineControl_Description
data.value: The point at which the CPU triggers dynamic power consumption adjustment for the GPU.

data.name: PowerPlansWindow_AoAcWarning_Message
data.value: Windows reports that this laptop supports Modern Standby. Using power plans other than Balanced may cause unexpected behavior.

data.name: SettingsPage_WindowsPowerPlans_Message
data.value: Select Windows Power Plans to apply when Power Mode changes.

data.name: SettingsPage_WindowsPowerPlansControlPanel_Title
data.value: Power Plan options in Windows Control Panel

data.name: SpectrumKeyboardBacklightImportProfileAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Import and apply backlight configuration to the current profile.

data.name: MultipleTriggersAutomationPipelineTrigger_DisplayName
data.comment: Allows the user to merge multiple triggers for the execution of selected actions.

data.name: OverclockDiscreteGPUControl_Message
data.value: Increase performance by overclocking discrete GPU.

data.name: OverclockDiscreteGPUAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value:
Increase performance by overclocking discrete GPU.
WARNING: This action will not run correctly, if discrete GPU is not available.

data.name: PortsBacklightControl_Message
data.value: Turn on or off backlight of the ports on the back of the laptop.

data.name: PortsBacklightAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Turn on or off the backlight of the ports on the back of the laptop.

data.name: PanelLogoBacklightControl_Message
data.value: Turn on or off the backlight on the lid of the laptop.

data.name: PanelLogoBacklightAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Turn on or off the backlight on the lid of the laptop.

data.name: InstantBootControl_Message
data.value: Turn on the laptop when a charger is connected.

data.name: InstantBootAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Turn on the laptop when a charger is connected.

data.name: PowerModeUnavailableWithoutACException_Message
data.value: {0} power mode is not available without AC power.
data.comment: For example: "{Performance} power mode is not available without AC power."

data.name: IGPUModeChangeException_Title
data.value: Could not change GPU Working Mode

data.name: IGPUModeChangeException_Message
data.value: Try changing the mode again in a couple of seconds, if you do not see expected result. If dGPU does not respond at all, please restart your laptop.

data.name: IGPUModeChangeException_Message_IGPUOnly
data.value: dGPU will disconnect automatically when not in use.

data.name: IGPUModeChangeException_Title_Auto
data.value: dGPU is currently in use or laptop is not on battery power

data.name: IGPUModeChangeException_Message_Auto
data.value: dGPU will disconnect automatically when not in use and laptop is on battery power.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_VantageWarning_Title
data.value: Custom Mode settings will not be applied correctly when Lenovo Vantage or its services are running.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_LegionZoneWarning_Title
data.value: Custom Mode settings will not be applied correctly when Legion Zone or its services are running.

data.name: ComboBoxHybridModeAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Select GPU operating mode based on your computer's usage and power conditions. Switching modes may require restart.

data.name: ToggleHybridModeAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: Allow switching between integrated and discrete GPU. Requires restart.

data.name: GodModeSettingsWindow_GPU_ToCpuDynamicBoostControl_Description
data.value: This is the maximum additional power that can be allocated to the CPU from the GPU based on CPU usage. The higher the value, the better the performance of applications that use the CPU.

data.name: SettingsPage_BootLogo_Message
data.value: Customize Boot Logo image, visible during system startup.

data.name: SettingsPage_SmartFnLock_Message
data.value: Fn Lock will be temporarily disabled when Alt, Ctrl or Shift key is depressed.

data.name: BootLogoWindow_Description
data.value: Custom boot logo must be exactly {0} pixels large. Supported formats are: {1}.

data.name: BatteryNightChargeModeControl_Message
data.value: When enabled, this device will charge to 80% when plugged in overnight and finish charging to 100% by the time you use this device in the morning.

data.name: BatteryNightChargeAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: When enabled, this device will charge to 80% when plugged in overnight and finish charging to 100% by the time you use this device in the morning.

data.name: BootLogoWindow_SetError_Not_Enough_Free_Space_On_EFI_Partition
data.value: Not enough free space on EFI partition.

data.name: BootLogoWindow_SetCustomFailed
data.value: Custom logo could not be set: {0}

data.name: BootLogoWindow_SetDefaultFailed
data.value: Default logo could not be set: {0}

data.name: WiFiConnectedPipelineTriggerTabItemContent_LeaveEmptyForAnyNetwork
data.value: Leave empty for any Wi-Fi network.

data.name: SettingsPage_HWiNFO_Message
data.value: Share fan speed, battery temperature etc. with HWiNFO64. You may need to restart HWiNFO64 after changing this option.

data.name: PeriodicActionPipelineTriggerTabItemContent_PeriodMinutes
data.comment: A prompt that is used both to ask the user to input an integer, representing the number of minutes between two periodic actions are triggered, and to inform the user what have they set once they are done configuring the action.

data.name: SettingsPage_OnBatterySinceReset_Message
data.value: Resets the counter for "On battery since" in the battery section when the system reboots.

data.name: RunAutomationStepControl_ProcessRunSilently_Description
data.value: Execute console applications, without creating a console window.

data.name: RunAutomationStepControl_ProcessWaitUntilFinished_Description
data.value: Wait until program or script finishes executing

data.name: SpeakerAutomationStepControl_Message
data.value: When mute, all active audio output devices will be muted.

data.name: SettingsPage_MinimizeToTray_Message
data.value: Always minimize to tray instead of taskbar.

data.name: Settings_GodModeFnQSwitchable_Title
data.value: Switch to Custom Mode with Fn+Q

data.value: Allow quick switching to Custom Mode with Fn+Q.

data.name: SettingsPage_PowerModeMapping_Message
data.value: Automatically change Windows Power Plan or Windows Power Mode when changing Power Modes.

data.value: Select Windows Power Mode to apply when Power Mode changes.

data.value: Error occured when reading device information.

data.value: Lenovo Legion Toolkit must be running for macros to work.

data.name: MacroPage_Subtitle
data.value: You can record series of key presses and invoke them using the number pad on your keyboard.

data.name: SettingsPage_CLI_Message

data.name: NotificationsSettingsWindow_NotificationAlwaysOnTop_Message
data.value: Always put notification at the top. It won't affect other full screen windows, but you will not be able to click on the notifications.

data.name: SettingsPage_UseNewSensorDashboard_Message
data.value: Use new sensor dashboard instead of the old one. Note: Using the new sensor dashboard may cause some antivirus programmes to display a warning pop-up. For more information, see: LibreHardwareMonitor/LibreHardwareMonitor#984

data.value: Lock LLT's window size. To prevent something change it.

data.name: MainWindow_PawnIO_Warning_Message
data.value: You need install PawnIO first to use the new dashboard!

data.value: Windows Dynamic lighting is enabled. This feature might prevent LLT to control the keyboard. Click Yes to disable and No to ignore.
